markdownRemark.excerpt: Tech stack Node.js, React.js, Redux, Socker.IO
markdownRemark.html:
This application consists in an e-commerce scraper (it crawls across multiple websites in parallel). The back end is a Node.js app, and the front end is React.js/Redux. You can read more about it in the repo itself.

Tech stack

Node.js, React.js, Redux, Socker.IO

frontmatter.title: JS guide for Java developers: Part 1 — scope, closures, global context, this, and undefined
